entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Elliot Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
